member.name: MFNetCredentialManagerGetParam
member.summary: Contains the authentication information for the credential manager.

member.name: MFNetCredentialManagerGetParam.hrOp
member.summary: The response code of the authentication challenge. For example, NS_E_PROXY_ACCESSDENIED.

member.name: MFNetCredentialManagerGetParam.fAllowLoggedOnUser
member.summary: Set this flag to TRUE if the currently logged on user's credentials should be used as the default credentials.

member.name: MFNetCredentialManagerGetParam.fClearTextPackage
member.summary: If TRUE, the authentication package will send unencrypted credentials over the network. Otherwise, the authentication package encrypts the credentials.

member.name: MFNetCredentialManagerGetParam.pszUrl
member.summary: The original URL that requires authentication.

member.name: MFNetCredentialManagerGetParam.pszSite
member.summary: The name of the site or proxy that requires authentication.

member.name: MFNetCredentialManagerGetParam.pszRealm
member.summary: The name of the realm for this authentication.

member.name: MFNetCredentialManagerGetParam.pszPackage
member.summary: The name of the authentication package. For example, "Digest" or "MBS_BASIC".

member.name: MFNetCredentialManagerGetParam.nRetries
member.summary: The number of times that the credential manager should retry after authentication fails.
